title: The Logic Gates
subtitle: And, Or, Not Operators
description:
# Logical Operators: Combining Conditions

## The AND Operator

Both conditions must be true:

```gdscript
var has_key = true
var door_unlocked = false

if has_key and not door_unlocked:
    print("Can unlock door!")
```

## The OR Operator

At least one condition must be true:

```gdscript
if health < 20 or mana < 10:
    print("Resources low!")
```

## The NOT Operator

Reverses a boolean:

```gdscript
var is_daytime = false
if not is_daytime:
    print("It's night!")
```

## Your Quest

Create a quest eligibility checker using logical operators.
starterCode:
# Quest Eligibility Checker
var player_level = 15
var has_completed_tutorial = true
var has_weapon = true
var gold = 100

# Check if player can start quest
# Requirements: level >= 10 AND tutorial done AND (has weapon OR gold >= 50)
solutionCode:
# Quest Eligibility Checker
var player_level = 15
var has_completed_tutorial = true
var has_weapon = true
var gold = 100

# Check if player can start quest
if player_level >= 10 and has_completed_tutorial and (has_weapon or gold >= 50):
    print("Quest Available!")
    print("You meet all requirements")
else:
    print("Quest Locked")
    if player_level < 10:
        print("- Level too low (need 10)")
    if not has_completed_tutorial:
        print("- Complete tutorial first")
    if not has_weapon and gold < 50:
        print("- Need weapon or 50 gold")
